vclaim: A WhatsApp video called "Carnaval de las palomitas" or "Popcorn Carnival" is hacking users' phones.
title: ‘Popcorn Carnival’ WhatsApp Hoax
subtitle: Another WhatsApp malware hoax is circulating, this time warning that a "Carnaval de las palomitas" or "Popcorn Carnival" video could "hack" your phone.
author: Kim LaCapria
